Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: '3:20 p.m. F6 Military Warehouse, Command Central'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Three packages of serum, injectors, bio-type filters...'}
{3: 'A worker is reading out a catalogue of supplies while adjusting his glasses.'}
{2: '??', 3: "But hey, Gray Raven's commandant, right? Did something happen to the usual girl?"}
{2: 'Liv has something to take care of.', 3: '8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sorry, Commandant. I might need your help...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm usually the one to claim supplies for the squad every Thursday, but there's an emergency at the Star of Life. I'll have to go help...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No worries.', 3: '14', 4: 'Leave this to me.', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The officer there is called Ailes, and he's a very nice person! So don't worry, Commandant! Just give him the list and he'll get the supplies ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ailes', 3: 'Ah, I see... Hmm... Must be the squad that went missing in the frontlines. Heard Walker and the others talking about them this morning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ailes', 3: "What a world we live in. War that just never ends... Oh, the rack's empty, hang on a sec.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Ailes turns and scans his ID card, entering a room to the side. While waiting, you look around casually—some hurried-looking workers from other departments, and some Constructs here for military supplies...'}
{3: 'A red shade suddenly flirts into your eyes. That person seems to be in conversation.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A woman with red hair. Furrowing her brows, she seems to be talking to a stranger. The man is gesturing brusquely and talking gruffly, to which she responds with a condescending smirk.'}
{3: 'The woman then mutters something, which deflates the man almost instantly. He begins looking around nervously.'}
{2: '(What are they doing...?)', 3: '29'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ailes', 3: "Commandant? What's the matter? Took me ages to find you!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sudden exclamation removes you from your voyeuristic venture.'}
{2: 'Ailes', 3: 'Here. These should be the supplies you need. Please check and confirm.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ailes leaves after he hands the trunk of resources over to you. As if drawn by a flame, your gaze is helplessly tugged back to the corner with the woman, only to find her already absent.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Need anything?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Peeping around like a rat, you can't be looking for me, can you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Honest to a fault, hm?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But, well. I'm not in the mood right now. Need me for something—try booking earlier. I might consider entertaining you for a few seconds.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Tsk, tsk—liar, liar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Not into liars, uh-uh.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Vera crosses her arms, revealing a medical bag—something she just acquired—before her torso. Noticing your eyes being drawn downward, she props both hands on her hips. A bemused shadow flickers past her eyes.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Whatcha looking at?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ah. Or, should I say? You like what you see?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Having such true-to-yourself eyes—you must have a death wish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Apologize.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Apology accepted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Apology accepted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But before that... You wondering about what I was doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Then why are you staring at me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Oh. I get it now. You were wondering about "me?"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Pfft, you sorry little fool. But, well...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you want to know more...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera shuffles closer and whispers.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Come closer, shh, I'll tell you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You lean closer to Vera, only to be met with biting pain on your forehead.'}
{3: 'Ignoring your yelp, Vera curls her fingers and knocks you on the forehead once more. The force that she knocks you with almost sends you reeling. People call her a hyena for a reason.'}
{3: 'Vera scoffs, then crosses her arms again.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Stop sticking your nose into other people's business. Get it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Thanks. Now get out of my sight.', 4: '1'}
